about_the_game:
This game is created by @Cornmeal with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

What's the game about?

Step into the story of Lily, a young and innocent girl who formerly faced the horrors of persistent bullying at school. In this gripping psychological thriller, you will face Lily's black past firsthand as you embark on a journey of fear, loneliness, and never-ending torment. Navigate through a horrific school campus, where every gloomy corridor and abandoned corner hides dark secrets and unspeakable evil. The once-familiar passageways now throb with evil energy, echoing haunting whispers from the past.
In this game, you will need to use the faint light of a flashlight to search for clues, which may be hidden in drawers or other obscure places. Explore Lily's story by carefully examining your surroundings and using the flashlight to reveal hidden details in the darkness. Each discovery brings you closer to understanding the depth of her suffering and the dark conspiracy that haunts her. Will you be able to guide Lily through this harrowing ordeal, facing the phantoms of her past and uncovering the sinister truths that lie within?

PUZZLE! Help her find solace amidst the darkness, and perhaps, a chance at redemption.
PREPARE YOURSELF for an emotionally charged experience that will test your wits and courage.
IN "LILY", the past is never truly gone, and the horrors of yesterday linger on, waiting to be unearthed. Are you ready to confront the darkness and unravel the mystery?

Key features:

  • Psychological Thriller Experience
  • Intricate Puzzles and Clues
  • Atmospheric Exploration

Designer's Comment:

As an indie game designer, I want to share a heartfelt message with you. "Lily" is a labor of hardworking, crafted with dedication and passion. While it may not be perfect and there may be some rough edges, every detail has been meticulously designed with the hope of providing a deeply emotional and immersive experience. This story is based on the backdrop of school bullying, and through this game, I aim to bring awareness to this pressing issue. It is a reflection on the impact of bullying and a call to action to stand against it.
I have poured my heart into this project, and I am committed to improving and evolving the game based on your feedback. Thank you for your support and understanding as we navigate this journey together. Your experience and enjoyment mean the world to me.
The game will launch in August 2024! If you're interested, please add it to your Steam wishlist – it would be very appreciated and really useful. Please feel free to share your thoughts and feedback with me. Thank you again.

short_description: Step into the story of a young girl tormented by her past. Discover dark mysteries and solve complicated riddles on a scary school campus. The unsettling atmosphere, important clues, and Lily's broken recollections await you. Can you help her find comfort in darkness?
